name: Street Surveillance Technologies (2021)
description: Object detection, pose estimation, & face detection of recent footage of BLM & HK protests, & archival Black Panther footage serve as an example of what government agency surveillance systems are technically capable of seeing. This artwork serves to raise awareness of mass surveillance and facial recognition of citizens, & to remind protestors to cover their face during demonstrations. https://bit.ly/3slyrT2  100% of the profits will go to the protests in Colombia --> https://bit.ly/3h1Uk7J
